entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json source generation and records from another assembly #62374
  • DllImportGenerator is failing in Mono llvmfullAOT #62372
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimiter should implement IDisposable and IAsyncDisposable #62370
  • [wasm] Windows/AOT failing tests #62363
    .NET 7.0
  • [wasm] Linux/AOT tests(9) broken #62362
    .NET 7.0
  • [wasm] browser-bench appstart is broken on main #62357
    .NET 7.0
  • Question: How is the API diff made? #62356
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not ignore delegate properties #62354
  • Access violation executing location when closing an application that hosts the .NET 5.0 Runtime via CoreCLRHost #62346
  • Consider adding RegexOptions.RightToLeft support back to compilation #62345
    Future
  • System.Reflection.MethodInfo.CreateDelegate<T> method failing with System.ArgumentException #62366
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe.AsPtrRef<T, U>(ref T* source) : ref U #62342
  • [iOS/tvOS] Test Failure System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.CanZipNamedPipe #62341
  • .NET Standard 2.0 should have an overload of Encoding.GetString() that takes a ReadOnlySpan<byte> parameter. #62340
  • DllImport of MacOS frameworks not working on Big Sur #62337
  • threading/NamedMutex/test1/paltest_namedmutex_test1 failed #62336
  • [mono] Context->method_inst is non-NULL but garbage on AOT #62334
    7.0.0
  • FileSystemGlobbing does not support specifying absolute paths. #62333
  • .NET 6 TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById does not support IANA timezone ids on Windows Server 2016 & 2019 #62329
    Future
  • Dynamic block nodes should not generate non-null assertions #62328
    Future
  • JIT does not recognize Vector<T>.Count and Vector{128|256}.Count is unsigned in div / mod #62326
    7.0.0
  • .net 6 blazor can't publish #62332
  • Crossgen2 does not reliably align data used by CreateSpan<T> #62316
    7.0.0
  • Validate that ilasm/ildasm round-tripping does not lose alignment of FieldRVA data #62315
    7.0.0
  • Reflection.Emit does not reliably allow use of CreateSpan<T> with non 8 byte aligned data #62314
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Metadata does not allow RVA mapped fields to be reliably aligned to 8 byte boundaries #62313
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Intrinsics\\CreateSpan_il\\CreateSpan_il.cmd #62312
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case05/case05.sh #62311
    7.0.0
  • Rfc3161TimestampToken.TryDecode does not work for timestamps in Windows OS libraries Authenticode signatures #62307
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure in JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #53321
    Future
  • Test failure in JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #32730
    Future
  • Finish "simplified" regex codegen strategy #61902
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `Loader/classloader/explicitlayout/NestedStructs/case04/case04.sh` failing with `FAIL: object and non-object field overlap was not detected` #62303
  • [wasm][aot] Almost all library tests failing on Windows with `RuntimeError: null function or function signature mismatch` #61721
    7.0.0
  • Calling Pipe.Writer.WriteAsync after Pipe.Writer.Advance flush truncated data to the PipeReader. #62167
    7.0.0
  • `DispatchProxy` cannot work with types from collectible assemblies. #62050
    7.0.0
  • DispatchProxy.Create<IProxy, Base> uncastable to Base in custom load context #60468
    7.0.0
  • User Secrets file is required, even when it's excluded in conditional compile #62320
  • System.Windows.Extensions outerloop test SoundPlayerTests.LoadAsync_SourceLocationFromNetwork_Success failing #62305
  • [API Proposal] [.NET 7] [EPIC] : public shared class ->multiple pathway for object oriented constructions (ooc) #62327
  • [mono] custom debugger extenstion #62220
  • WPF : Build Fault-Tolerant Composite Applications in .Net 6 #62272
  • C# Cannot get default value from System.Type class #62274
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\X86Base\\Pause_ro\\Pause_ro.cmd #61901
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix SuperPMI unit test 'strip' behavior #62373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert (#62339) to unblock CI #62371
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revise the Regex description output in source #62369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • JIT: three fixes for OSR #62367
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert System.DirectoryServices.Protocols and System.Drawing.Common to use GeneratedDllImport #62365
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Remove #ifs in System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter #62364
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Remove explicit Exe output types from tests without Main #62361
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Small fix for Crossgen2 execution on Windows #62358
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix a case of hang while allocating at LOH boundary #62355
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Re-enable windows wasm AOT tests #62352
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fixes an issue with FeatureSIMD=0 and ArmBase.Yield #62351
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62350
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 5.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Add regex test for parsing runtime-assets expressions #62344
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix bug for Assertion failed '(op3Reg != targetReg) || (op1Reg == targetReg)' during 'Generate code' #62343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Use Spans on Go() methods for Code Gen engines #62324
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Fix superpmi.exe handling of exclusion lists #62349
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always create the AsmDiffs zip file to upload for asmdiff pipeline #62368
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi.py collect script #62347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add RateLimiting APIs #61788
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Delete old code generation approach from RegexCompiler / source generator #62318
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Consistently use CreateProxyUri in WebProxy ctors #62338
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add parser tests from nim-regex #62093
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update overlapped field test to conflict on 32-bit arches #62308
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the passing/returning of small vtypes. #62299
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Fix a windows cross compiler issue. #62339
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Simplify code emitted for single char repeater #62322
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable TestIgnoreCaseRelationBorderCasesInNonBacktracking test #62319
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62306
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [mono] Disable new test running on AOT. #62335
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Support unloadability in `DispatchProxy`. #62095
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix soundplayer assertion failure #62323
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Avoid closure for GetOrAdd #62317
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Move the remainder of X509Certificates and TestUtilities use GeneratedDllImport #62309
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Work around `System.Diagnostics.Tests.StopwatchTests.GetTimestamp` failure #62290
    arch-wasm
  • Ensure that we don't try to get the simdBaseJitType for scalar intrinsics #61982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Reduce repeated variable add operations to a single multiply. #61663
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Finish new code gen approach for RegexCompiler / source generator #62268
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use GeneratedDllImport throughout System.Private.CoreLib. #62295
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Filter blocks to be used for hiding alignment instruction #62262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Update previous netcoreapp version to run API Compat against 6.0 ref pack #61437
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Move FabricBot rules to Config-As-Code #62297
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Build improvements, and fixes #61581
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Ensure all types are loaded when methods are accessed as function pointers #62158
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • WIP: first group project for type generator tests 0-99 #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Make some icalls return objects using an extra ObjectHandleOnS… #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Add Browsable Attribute support. #62045
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP]: Accelerate additional cross platform hardware intrinsics #61649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce allocations in code generated by Logging generators (#61162) #62011
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Mark static boxes as invariant #62298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ETW events for creation of VSD stubs #62255
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Prevent potential out of bounds write on Android #62275
    area-System.Security
  • Optimize XmlTextEncoder.Write #61773
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Follow up to universal System.Linq.Expressions #62229
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to automate nativeaot compiler targeted for x64 using 32bit vs command prompt #1766

Closed

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Package Validation] We should support excluding tfms when running the validation #22901
    7.0.1xx
  • [workload] Machine readable outputs should only output JSON #22887
  • `dotnet workload update --print-rollback` should not require elevated privileges #22886
  • Is Blazor Hot Report Supported for Visual Studio for Mac ? #22884

Closed

  • Icon.Save(stream) each time returns different results #22549

PullRequests

Created

  • Update to use new Razor transport packages #22902
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove -a shortland for dll tests container scenario for 7.0 #22898
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-DotNet Test
  • Transform arch switch to platform for dll tests container scenario #22897
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Fixes aspnetcore#38798 #22891
  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add documentation for workload rollback #22885
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Switch to Ubuntu 1804 #22875
  • Merge 6.0.1xx into the 6.0.2xx branch to catch it up to current #22861
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Containing{Type/Assembly/Symbol/etc} are marked nullable oblivious #58107
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58106
  • Value Tracking Shows ALL THE THINGS #58104
  • IDE0005 not reported as build warning #58103
  • Feature xxx is currently unavailable due to an internal error. StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Cannot find the old value #58102
  • [Request] "Pick members" dialog should focus search input #58099
  • API proposal: Introduce a strongly-typed diagnostic properties #58097
  • Incorrect IDE0004: Remove unnecessary cast #58095
  • Provide interactive help to reflow expressions #58093
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup supports naming style rules #58090
  • Code cleanup supports third party analyzers #58089
  • Code cleanup settings UI matches editorconfig settings editor #58088
  • Code cleanup supports editorconfig #58087

Closed

  • Select builder item if nothing in the CompletionList matches what user typed #57846
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert SourceLink PRs #58109
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lazy load ISourceLinkService to reduce DLL loads #58108
    Area-IDE
  • Run builds with $TempDir redirected to a new drive #58105
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update API suggestion template #58098
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Skip flaky CommandLine.ArgumentParsing test #58100
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #58092
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Add scripts to verify if a branch is ready to review #58110
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Playwright based BlazorTemplates.Tests skipped on helix #38818
  • Append /Index to directory asp-page #38816
  • Consider using esproj files in the repo #38810
  • Hotreload not working with .cshtml files #38809
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing 6.0.0 has concurrency issues on filesystem #38808
  • RZ1035 when new line in closing tag #38805
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Image srcset and size on Blazor WASM is not working on Safari. #38804
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes_ef #38803

Closed

  • [AspNetCore.Identity] CreateAsync without validation #38791
    Discussions
  • Unable to publish views of a Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web project #36583
    Discussions
  • cshtml: RazorRuntimeCompilation and "Nullable type parameter" Exception #27940
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Error when deploying on IIS even though code works in debug mode #26698
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Looking for the source code of .NET Core 3.1.20, Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer #38812
  • ValidateAntiForgeryToken #38748
  • Interop.Functional tests failing on Debian 11 arm #38794
    Test failures
  • please ignore #38806
  • Testing: RedirectHandler incorrectly copies Authorization header to redirected requests #20896
    .NET 7 Planning
  • TouchEventArgs.Type is always null #32397
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor - MouseEventArgs.Type property is always null in .NET 6.0 #38782
    6.0.x
  • Use Json Source Generators With Minimum APIs #38621

PullRequests

Created

  • LdapAdapter: Keep track of already processed groups to account for circular references #38817
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Backport `components-e2e` CI Pipeline Fixes to release/6.0 #38815
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Unquarantine tests #38814
  • Backport Blazor Fix Missing EventArgs.Type (#38792) to 6.0.2 #38811
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.2
  • Avoiding Inferred required attribute when default value is defined #38801
    area-mvc

Merged

  • IHtmlHelper doc: what goes into SelectListItem #38760
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Update IDeveloperPageExceptionFilter doc comment #38659
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Skip h2spec test enumeration on unsupported platforms #38799
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't copy authorization header during redirects in MvcTesting #38557
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Blazor Fix Missing EventArgs.Type #38792
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Linux: Fix nested group resolution for RBAC claims #35279
    area-security, community-contribution

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Save Image to Device #3658
  • ContentView doesn't get correct layout when backed by legacy renderer #3657
  • ScrollView inside a StackLayout doesn't Scroll #3655
  • VerticalStackLayout doesn't pass proper constraints to its children #3654
  • :net Maui StackLayout with radiobuttons inside StackLayout #3653
  • Default Maui projects giving various errors. It did work 4 days ago before the last update #3652
  • MAUI project not able to compile - Although .Net 6 workload with MAUI installed - MAUI templates installed #3651
  • StackLayout is an ambiguous reference between Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.StackLayout and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.StackLayout #3650
  • Maui content page not available #3649
  • VerticalOptions with Expand don't Expand StackLayout #3647
  • BlazorWebView -> Unable to customize Blazor Startup #3644
  • [Bug] iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #3643
  • When children are removed and added with InvalidateLayout, the position of the AbsoluteLayout children is not altered. #3639
  • Back arrow not visible for navigation page in Android #3638
  • Change of naming `INativeViewHandler.ContainerView` #3636

Closed

  • MAUI Grid renders differently from Forms Grid #3630
  • RelativeLayout Crashes on Android #3648
  • [Spec] Convert FlyoutPage to Handler on Android #2797
    6.0.200-preview.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix warnings from #3519 #3656
  • Switch to use CollectionView for Essentials Sample #3646
  • [Windows] Fix ImageButton Background #3642
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS, Windows] Implement Border properties in ImageButton #3641
    area/controls 🎮
  • Added missing references #3640
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • ZIndex proof-of-concept #3635
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲

Merged

  • Validate Handler Type getting assigned to View #3627
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3634
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Changes to improve Border control drawing performance #3620
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • [android] reduce JNI calls by moving logic into Java #3372
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix keyboard navigation with modal pages #3631
    area/a11y
  • Button Padding #3575
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • invalidcastexception in unit tests using in memory on count, firstordefault, of many to many related entities #26893
  • Applying type mappings in translators #26891
  • Replace EnumToNumberConverter with EnumToStringConverter in ConfigureConventions #26890
  • Migrate does not create initial database with tables #26889
  • SQL Server Migrations: Unable to rename or drop Table with custom schema. #26887
  • Navigations to/from join entity are not fixed up when new many-to-many relationship is created #26886
    7.0.0
  • EnsureCreated fails with CosmosDB if Scale not set #26885
  • Huge amount of TaskCanceledException being logged #26884

Closed

  • Null semantics and custom function expression #19219
  • What happened to CSharpMigrationsGenerator? #26888
  • The LINQ expression could not be translated after upgrading to .NET 6 from .NET 5 #26883
  • How is the file <project folder>\obj\<project>.csproj.EntityFrameworkCore.targets generated? #26865
  • ComplexTypes and Constructors to work with NullReferenceTypes #26866
  • [.NET 6] Migrate API - Could not find method 'AddYears' on type 'System.DateOnly' #26860
  • How to join a table with out a foreign key? #26832
  • Lazy load works incorrectly if property set is executed before the first load #26829
  • Entity tracking #26819
  • Custom ValueConverterSelector does not work in version 6 for cosmos provider #26815
  • Adding graph of entries to already filled ChangeTracker #26803
  • Method not found: 'System.Type Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.ITypeBase.get_ClrType()'. #26701

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0.2] Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26892
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Detach join entity when removing added relationship #26853
    blocked
  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
    community-contribution
  • Change timer from method variable to property of SqlConnectioninteral #26495

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #installer-119839-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #12746

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12743
